title: Adding or removing a new non-preferred payout method does not trigger an e-mail or account notification

profile.name: HackerOne
profile.about: Vulnerability disclosure should be safe, transparent, and rewarding.

summaries.content: While we previously sent an e-mail to the user when their preferred payout method was modified, we did not send a notification when adding or removing a new non-preferred payout method. This oversight was pointed out by this report.
